name: places/ChIJkV7-t9gZ2jERaxT9li_npF0/reviews/ChZDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnTUNJZ195bUhBEAE
text: {'text': 'Was at the Shaw Balestier cinema for the first time after the major renovation. A Minecraft Movie. Clean, fresh and good natural lighting. Very welcoming. Decor is retro of the 70s which I guess Shaw theatre was birthed right here. Seats are comfortable, good leg room, cosy and intimate ambience with right air con temperature. Hall 2. Sound system is great too despite the small size as expected will be deafening but no, not at all. Distance from screen to my row, 2nd row from one and only entrance/exit was good, not glaring. Very enjoyable movie and experience. So much better compared to before renovation.', 'languageCode': 'en'}
originalText: {'text': 'Was at the Shaw Balestier cinema for the first time after the major renovation. A Minecraft Movie. Clean, fresh and good natural lighting. Very welcoming. Decor is retro of the 70s which I guess Shaw theatre was birthed right here. Seats are comfortable, good leg room, cosy and intimate ambience with right air con temperature. Hall 2. Sound system is great too despite the small size as expected will be deafening but no, not at all. Distance from screen to my row, 2nd row from one and only entrance/exit was good, not glaring. Very enjoyable movie and experience. So much better compared to before renovation.', 'languageCode': 'en'}

name: places/ChIJkV7-t9gZ2jERaxT9li_npF0/reviews/ChZDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnTURnNzdQQUZREAE
text:
{'text': 'Not So Crowded New Cinema

This is a beautifully renovated cinema owned by Shaw. It’s quite immaculately built and obviously built for the long term, given they own the building after all.

Love the wood paneling lining the escalator path up to the movie theatres. You are then greeted with greenery and natural light thru a glass ceiling.  Great touch !

Seats were comfortable. Sounds system was great and the screen display was nice and sharp. Well, everything’s quite new anyway, so why won’t it be.

Definitely my new go to cinema.', 'languageCode': 'en'}
originalText:

name: places/ChIJkV7-t9gZ2jERaxT9li_npF0/reviews/ChdDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnTUNRdHVTUnVnRRAB
text: {'text': 'Very clean! Love the cleanliness, comfort and cool design of the whole space. Enjoyed watching Baby Hero movie there. Air con was at a comfortable temperature, not too cold. Best cinema theatre I have been to in a long while.', 'languageCode': 'en'}

name: places/ChIJkV7-t9gZ2jERaxT9li_npF0/reviews/ChdDSUhNMG9nS0VNV3I4T1c2bXUtdWhBRRAB
text: {'text': "Now it's modern and well layout, many children extra curriculum activity, beautiful new cinema worth a family visit.\nTips: cinema comes with family style, food for whole family plus collins.", 'languageCode': 'en'}
originalText: {'text': "Now it's modern and well layout, many children extra curriculum activity, beautiful new cinema worth a family visit.\nTips: cinema comes with family style, food for whole family plus collins.", 'languageCode': 'en'}

name: places/ChIJkV7-t9gZ2jERaxT9li_npF0/reviews/ChdDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnSUNycHQ3dHhnRRAB
text: {'text': "I was pleasantly surprised when I arrived at Shaw Plaza and saw that the place had been well renovated. It is much cozier now compared to the past when I last visited. It has been a long time since I was here. The atmosphere was very cool and refreshing, thanks to the strong air conditioning. The cinema has also undergone renovations in the past. The seating used to be uncomfortable, and there were only a few people in the theater when I visited many years ago.\n\nNow, the theater is fully renovated, and the seating is incredibly comfortable with a good sound system. Stepping into this place makes me feel relaxed and cozy. My buddy and I rode our bicycles to the theater, a tradition we have enjoyed for many years. The theater provides a comfortable feel and is easily accessible by bicycle. We managed to park our bicycles well, as long as we didn't cycle with a large group of friends. One or two bicycles in any theater would be just nice. When visiting the mall, I always remember to park my bicycle near the back or close to the handicap area. I prefer to sit near the back or the side of the theater when I decide to cycle to the theaters.", 'languageCode': 'en'}
